1.description: When you take damage, 10% of it is delayed and instead dealt over 10 seconds. While you take delayed damage, gain 5% lifesteal. Does not apply to damage under 10% of your max HP.

2.description: When you take damage, 15% of it is delayed and instead dealt over 10 seconds. While you take delayed damage, gain 5% lifesteal. Does not apply to damage under 10% of your max HP.

6.description: When you take damage, 35% of it is delayed and instead dealt over 10 seconds. While you take delayed damage, gain 5% lifesteal. Does not apply to damage under 10% of your max HP.
